name: Sunday coffee at Ada's Discovery Cafe (CAPITOL HILL)
description:
I thought we'd get some coffee in before checking out the Broadway Farmers Market then check out the Bunka Gakuen Fashion Show from Tokyo, Japan at the Broadway Performance Hall at 3 pm.
Roaster: Olympia

https://seattlefarmersmarkets.org/markets/broadway
https://bwu.bunka.ac.jp/languages/english/info/?post_id=4914

Buses: 2, 9, 11, 49, 60, & First Hill Streetcar.
Nearby buses: 8, 10, 12, 47, 454 & Sound Transit Light Rail.

I have reserved some free fashion show tickets for the 3pm show but if
